entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
